org.eclipse.scada.ds

Interface DataStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStorage, StorageImpl, StorageImpl

    public interface DataStore
    A data store service interface
    Since:
    0.15.0

    • Method Detail

      • attachListener

        void attachListener(java.lang.String nodeId,
                  DataListener listener)
        Attach a listener to a data node

        The listener is called with the current status of the node when attaching.

        Parameters:
        nodeId - the node id to attach to
        listener - the listener that will receive events

      • detachListener

        void detachListener(java.lang.String nodeId,
                  DataListener listener)

      • deleteNode

         deleteNode(java.lang.String nodeId)

      • writeNode

         writeNode(DataNode node)

      • readNode

         readNode(java.lang.String nodeId)
        Get the data node
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node to get
        Returns:
        the future to the read request. The future will return null if the node does not exists.
